English: Do you like to go hiking?
I am trying to learn a new language.
French: Je tente d'apprendre une nouvelle langue.

English: What is your favorite thing to do in the summer?
French: Quel est ton favori pour passer l'été ?

English: I am going to the gym every morning.
French: J'ai l'habitude de me rendre au gymnase tous les matins.

English: What kind of music do you enjoy listening to?
French: Quel genre de musique aimes-tu écouter ?
